topic.title: 来零网的朋友，请明辨一下事非
topic.body:
那个管理员和那个kai0的真的就是个老鼠屎啊，把这里弄得乌烟瘴气。那个kai0更恶心，叼着英语和老外在英文论坛下面和声和气的说话，到了这里就他娘的变了一个人，我日你妈卖批。

另外，即使来了这里，你也要明白zeronet也不是绝对开放和自由的，一切都是相对的。

1562671898_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body:
> [xcape2net](#comment_110_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): We have a limited amount of freedom.  The Chinese have a limited amount of freedom.  Our limited amount is more than their limited amount.  But, our limited amount is nothing close to what the United States constitution intended.  I could point to numerous violations of every one of those freedoms that you named above without even trying.  The statement that what we have is a "free society" is debatable.

没有什么是 "真正的自由"

1563249333_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nw.body: 今日份沙雕，免费送你家

1565095300_1PnHUGmQkYq4NKZBxFp8o1Wb1ZZij.body: A small number of people are full of violence and try to subvert the political power. They should be killed. In any case, Hong Kong will always be part of China, just like Hawaii is part of the United States.
